sectionHeading: Weekend Events / Traffic Impacts for March 7 - 8

day: Upcoming Closure Scheduled for Ave of Champions:
event: Monday 3/9 at 6 a.m. (approximate) thru Friday 3/27.  Closure will be in effect 24 hrs/day.

day: Upcoming Closure Scheduled for Ave of Champions:
event: The lane from S Limestone toward S MLK will be CLOSED for major sewer line work.  Traffic on Limestone will be detoured to E Maxwell St.

day: Upcoming Closure Scheduled for Ave of Champions:
event: The lanes from S MLK toward S Limestone will remain open with traffic flowing one-way only.

day: Closure Scheduled for W Fourth St:
event: Saturday March 7 thru Friday March 13 - 24 hrs/day.

day: Closure Scheduled for W Fourth St:
event: Street CLOSED between N Upper St and N Limestone for construction.

day: Lane Closures Scheduled for E Vine St:
event: Sunday March 8 from 6 a.m. to 3 p.m.

day: Lane Closures Scheduled for E Vine St:
event: Center and left lanes blocked at Quality St to deliver material atop KU building roof.
